prompt:
Use case: stylized-concept
Primary request: Orthographic top-down dark fantasy crypt entrance floor texture, cracked stone tiles with moss, iron gate frame visible at top edge, warm torchlight glow from sconces, readable navigation space.
Style preset: topdown-painterly-fantasy
Style: stylized painterly game texture
Constraints: no characters, no UI, no text, no logos, seamless play space, strong but not noisy contrast

promptSpec.primary: Orthographic top-down dark fantasy crypt entrance floor texture, cracked stone tiles with moss, iron gate frame visible at top edge, warm torchlight glow from sconces, readable navigation space.

prompt:
Use case: stylized-concept
Primary request: Orthographic top-down character sprite of an armored knight hero, viewed from above, full body visible, warm torchlit metal armor, sword and shield, clear directional silhouette.
